Name: Loader
About the game: Description: Loader is an exciting puzzle game where you place loads on platforms to pass levels. In this game you have to correctly place the loads onto platforms to pass the levels. Features: More than 15 exciting levels Ability to change textures Level editor Adding levels other players made Adding your own textures, as well as other players textures Steam Achievements
